name: Bite Me Wooden Bangle
description: This 100% all wooden bangle is so Glamourous. Hand-crafted wooden bangle is stained with a delicious mahogany stain and engraved with "Bite Me"...for the more refined Vampire fan. Wear with anything! Measures 1.75" wide bangle with 2.5" diameter. You won't find these anywhere but the FLUX shoppe. Please allow an additional 5 days for production. Enjoy!

name: Vintage Metal Letterpress Type Necklace
description: I admit it. I am a type lover. A type junkie, even. Vintage letterpress type has been crafted into a beautiful pendant with vintage letterpress type of CROSSES design. Silver pendant displays letterpress type, with genuine wooden background, all sealed with clear resin to preserve your little masterpiece. Pendant measures approx. .75" in diameter, and includes jump ring to secure to the chain/necklace/bracelet of your choice. This pendant is 2-sided! Second side is raw, unfinished wood in a mahogany stain. A FLUX original you won't find anywhere! Great gift idea. Enjoy!

name: POSTED Vintage Letterpress Metal Type Pendant
description: I admit it. I am a type lover. A type junkie, even. Vintage letterpress type has been crafted into a beautiful pendant with vintage letterpress type reading "posted". Silverplated pendant displays letterpress type, sealed with clear resin to preserve your little masterpiece. Pendant measures approx. .75" in diameter, and includes jump ring to secure to the chain/necklace/bracelet of your choice. Smooth silver back. A FLUX original you won't find anywhere! Great gift idea. Enjoy!

name: Barcode Wide Leather Cuff
description:
You're a Number, Nothing More.

This wide leather cuff is stunning with its soft black calfskin suede. Cuff measures 1.5" wide, and fits 7.5" wrist and adjust to fit 6.125" wrist. Bar Code design is screen printed in white. White pearl snaps closure, with soft suede lining for a comfy fit. Completely hand-crafted original leather design from FLUX-you won't find anywhere else! Are you ready for the Games?! If you need a different size, just convo me!

name: Coffin Handbag Macabre and Fabulous
description: This handcrafted little wooden coffin handbag/purse is so delicious! metallic black/grey, beautifully adorned cross on the front, with red velvet lining, and even a small mirror for putting on your lipstick. A sturdy, yet stylish, steel plated chain handle is just perfect for toting your little macabre work of art. And could you just die over the amazing felted swirl design that wraps around the entire coffin?! Just in time for swanky Halloween soirees, and any other occasion you might find for such a tasty tote. A FLUX original! Measures 6.25"x3"x2" and handle measures 10.5". Big enough for a cell phone, lipstick, bank card, and that's it, or any small items. Each coffin handbag may vary slightly in trim design and inside velvet details. Enjoy!
